    • Method Detail

      • connectToBrick

        void connectToBrick()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Connect the Phone to the Brick
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - If connection error occurs

      • disconnectFromBrick

        void disconnectFromBrick()
        Disconnect Phone from the Brick.

      • isConnectedToBrick

        boolean isConnectedToBrick()
        Returns the Connection-State of the Phone to Brick Connection
        Returns:
        true if connection is established

      • initializeConfiguration

        boolean initializeConfiguration()
                         throws BrickIsNotReadyException,
                                PortIsAlreadyInUseException
        Initializes the Configuration of your Robot. Brick gets the Information of the Configuration of the Robot and set the Endpoints up.
        Returns:
        true if the initializeation is complete
        Throws:
        BrickIsNotReadyException - - thrown if an error on the Brick Connection occurred
        PortIsAlreadyInUseException - - If you tried to initialize a brick-Hardware port twice.

      • abortConfiguration

        void abortConfiguration()
        Aborts the configuration process

      • isConfigurated

        boolean isConfigurated()
        Returns if the Configuration is complete
        Returns:
        true - if Configuration has finished and is complete.

      • isMessengerConnected

        boolean isMessengerConnected()
        Returns true if the messenger-client is connected to the Message server.
        Returns:
        true if connected

      • connectMessenger

        boolean connectMessenger(java.lang.String msgServerIP,
                         int msgServerTCPPort)
        Connects the Messenger-client to the Message Server.
        Parameters:
        msgServerIP - - ip of the message server
        msgServerTCPPort - - port of the message server
        Returns:
        true if connection was successful

      • disconnectMessenger

        void disconnectMessenger()
        Disconnects the Messenger-Client from the server.
